divs: Sighting Details it was around 10.30 pm to 11 pm i was sleeping on my top bunk of my bed i was stiring out the window win a red light apeared out of nowere and movie across the ski i felt so calm win i looked at it i ran up stirs telling my mom about what i seen she look out the window and she didt see anything i down stirs agin i wint to my brothers old room my dogs in the backyard look confusid stiring at the ski im not sure what i seen but im a major beliver in ufos even befour the strange light i seen welll i u no what i seen that night please contated me at 364-4479 of st,johns newfoundland
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in St John's
There were no other sightings in St John's on or around November 30th 2000
